meanings.definition: A person who has achieved the highest level of skill in a particular field, especially chess.
meanings.sent1: The grandmaster of chess won the tournament with ease.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to become a grandmaster in chess one day.
meanings.sent3: The grandmaster of puzzles always had the answer.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chess, he was a grandmaster among pawns.
meanings.sent5: Becoming a grandmaster requires dedication and practice.

meanings.definition: A title given to a chess player of the highest class.
meanings.sent1: The grandmaster received a trophy for winning the championship.
meanings.sent2: Players dream of earning the title of grandmaster in chess.
meanings.sent3: The grandmaster's moves on the board were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent4: She played chess with the precision of a grandmaster.
meanings.sent5: The grandmaster's strategy was unmatched by any opponent.

meanings.definition: A person who is highly skilled or accomplished in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: He was considered a grandmaster in the art of negotiation.
meanings.sent2: The chef was a grandmaster at creating delicious dishes.
meanings.sent3: The grandmaster of gardening could make any plant thrive.
meanings.sent4: She became a grandmaster in time management through practice.
meanings.sent5: Becoming a grandmaster requires continuous learning and improvement.
